description: This file defines the IUserSettings interface and its nested INotification interface for managing user settings, including localization, captions, privacy modes, and notifications within the WPEFramework project.

classes.name: IUserSettings
classes.description: An interface for managing and observing user settings such as audio description, language preferences, captions, closed captioning, and privacy mode.

classes.name: INotification
classes.description: An interface for receiving notifications about changes in user settings.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for user setting change events.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a previously registered notification callback.

methods.name: SetAudioDescription
methods.description: Enables or disables the audio description setting.

methods.name: GetAudioDescription
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the audio description setting.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets the list of preferred audio languages.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetPresentationLanguage
methods.description: Sets the presentation language in BCP 47 format.

methods.name: GetCaptions
methods.description: Retrieves the current captions enabled state.

methods.name: GetPreferredCaptionsLanguages
methods.description: Gets the current preferred captions languages.

methods.name: SetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Sets the preferred closed caption service.

methods.name: GetPreferredClosedCaptionService
methods.description: Gets the current preferred closed caption service.

ctags.name: INotification
ctags.pattern: /^  struct EXTERNAL INotification : virtual public Core::IUnknown {$/
